title: 6 Year account turns into Brand new account?
body:
Has anyone had the problem where they have made their League account from a very long time ago and coming back they play on a brand new account?

I'm having this problem. The current account i'm posting from was made 6 years ago, the original summoner name is FallenSkyress but now its AwakeningHorizon. I haven't changed the summoner name since the first one I bought and that was years ago. 

I know for a fact that I made this summoner name AwakeningHorizon was last year. I have emails showing this account that I log in with was made 6 years ago. If Riot wants to give the account a check from the changes they can go right ahead that would help me out. 

I know that I didn't write this very well but i'm just lost right now, I tried every username possible that I can remember with every password I've ever used and still have no luck trying to log into it. Hopefully this isn't confusing..(Even though it is)

replies.body:
Ouch, that's definitely not good! We don't reset accounts, so you've most likely just logged into the wrong account. You can use [**this page**](https://account.leagueoflegends.com/na/en/forgot-username) to recover usernames associated with your email address, which should get you in the right account.

Let me know if you have any other questions.

I've already tried recovering it, the username given is the username i'm logging into at the moment and that summoner name is incorrect. I'm really stressing at the moment because I absolutely have no idea whats going on.

Also, i'm sending a "forgot username" to a different email and i'm not receiving an email.. I don't think this should be happening

It sounds like there may be issues reaching the right account, then. I strongly recommend reaching out in a [**recovery ticket**](http://riot.com/2iGnX0K) so we can get you set up with an account recovery agent to sort this out.

Let me know if you have any issues submitting your ticket.
